text: Andrés Ducasse (born 24 June 1992) is a Chilean competitive sailor. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the men's 470 class. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean people of French descent Category:Chilean male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Chile Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – 470 Category:Pan American Games medalists in sailing Category:Sailors at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Chile
title: Andrés Ducasse
